text: PRISM Access info Must be connected to jumpbox, open chrome. PRISM IP: http://100.103.245.131:6080/ Password: prism To route to prism, use SDVN, ports, search for Prism in destinations. Route to whichever input you want. IP destinations 4 channels of audio SDI destinations 16 channels of audio
